name: nenai-mcp-quickstart
description: Quickstart for NenAI computer use automation with MCP tools

scripts.postinstall:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('.env')){fs.writeFileSync('.env','NEN_API_KEY=
NEN_DEPLOYMENT_ID=
');console.log('
‚úÖ Created .env file.
üìù Next steps:
   1. Add your NEN_API_KEY and NEN_DEPLOYMENT_ID to .env
   2. Run: npm run setup
   3. Restart Cursor
')}"
